Detailed Description

Provides control over MobileDragon sound system.

You don't create instances of SoundSystem by yourself, use sound_system member of System class instance.

Member Function Documentation

void Cleanup (   ) 
 

Stops all sounds, musics, releases all resources.

System sound output device remains open. There is no need to make call to Init() after Cleanup().

void FreeMusic (  Music *  music  ) 
 

Releases specified music object.

Parameters:
music - pointer to music object to release.

Releases specified sound object.

current system volume for sounds.

Bool Init (  DWord  freq,
DWord  bps,
Bool  stereo,
DWord  n_mod_chanels,
DWord  n_wav_chanels,
PackDir *  pack_dir
) 
 

Initializes SoundSystem.

Init() performs the complete initialization of SounSystem. Must be called before any other use of SoundSystem.

Parameters:
freq - output rate in hz( on Symbian limit this to 8000 or 16000).
bps - 16 or 8 bits output.
stereo - True for stereo output, False for mono.
q_mod_channels - maximum number of ProTracker channels available.
q_wav_channels - maximum number of Wave channels available.
pack_dir - pointer to PackDir object.
Returns:
True on success, False on failure.

Checks if playback of the music is paused.

Parameters:
music - pointer to music object to check.
Returns:
True if music is paused, False otherwise.

Checks if playback of the sound is paused.

Returns:

Checks if SoundSystem currently plays the music.

Parameters:
music - pointer to music object to check.
Returns:

For paused music resumes playback.

void Play (  Sound *  sound  ) 
 

Starts playback of specified sound.

For paused sound resumes playback.

Parameters:
sound - pointer to sound object to play.

void SetGlobalMusicVolume (  DWord  music_volume  ) 
 

Sets volume for all musics.

This affects all musics. Value ranges from 0 to 64. 0 is total silence. 64 maximum volume.

Parameters:
music_volume new volume value to set.

void SetGlobalSoundVolume (  DWord  sound_volume  ) 
 

Sets volume for all sounds.

This affects all sounds. Value ranges from 0 to 64. 0 is total silence. 64 maximum volume.

Parameters:
sound_volume new volume value to set.

void Shutdown (   ) 
 

Shuts down the sound system.

Calls Cleanup() and closes system sound output device.

void Stop (  Music *  music  ) 
 

Stops playback of specified music.

Parameters:
music - pointer to music object to stop.

void Stop (  Sound *  sound  ) 
 

Stops playback of specified sound.

Parameters:
sound - pointer to sound object to stop.
